text: Louis Pailhas (2 March 1926 - 6 February 2021),Monsieur Louis PAILHAS was a French politician and aerospace engineer. From December 1967 to 1982, he was head of the French Civil Aviation University.Bon vol Mr le Directeur … Louis Pailhas 1925 - 2021 He graduated from the École Polytechnique (X 46) and École nationale de l'aviation civile (IAC 49). he did different jobs in civil aviation Monsieur Louis PAILHAS before joining the French Civil Aviation University in December 1967, L’ ÉNAC à ORLY the first to hold that position in Toulouse. He resigned in January 1982. Décret du 21 janvier 1982 M. Pailhas Louis est nomme directeur de la navigation aerienne a l'administration centrale du ministere des transports, en remplacement de M. Machenaud Roger Arrêté du 19 juin 1990 portant admission à la retraite (aviation civile) After that, in 1998, he was assistant of the Mayor of Toulouse, Toulouse: tous présents pour l'Airbus géant and then deputy Mayor for science, aeronautics and space activities in 2001. Des têtes en l'air Louis Pailhas was a member of the Académie de l'air et de l'espace.
